column5: I was wondering if anyone knew where I could get some pink good fishing equip. Fisher girls looks cheap and useless, I'm not saying I don't agree with the cause it supports I just want something that will last and is good.
Sage Makes a Pink Fly rod... I think its Launch  , thats if you wanna start flyfishing, maybe a custom made rod too...
Yea thats not my thing but thanks
Ebay would be your best bet.

you may go  the nearest auto parts shop and have a can of " Mary Kay Pink" Mixed into a spraybomb. ask to have the paint mixed into a Acrylic Enamel have them add a Flex Agent to the recipe. should run about 25$, split on a can and paint more than one rod. or you can choose other shades of pink in the "chip book". Buy a rod of yer choice and go nuts with the masking tape { Norton Fineline tape...1/8"] it's blue. Once dry add a good coat of carnuba wax.
Maybe Chris (Spiel) could be talked into making one...  $???.??
When I was at Bass Pro Shops earlier in the week, I'm sure I saw some Shakespeare Ugly Stik rods that had pink on them and were aimed at girls/women.  Maybe check out their websites.  007
Found this on e on ebay. Nasty price tag! lol http://cgi.ebay.ca/Womens-Pink-Oceangirl-F...VQQcmdZViewItem

On a side note,  neighbours used to borrow garden tools from me and I'd never get them back. Now, when I buy a rake, shovel, spade or anything else, I paint the handles hot pink. They either don't borrow them now or when they do, they bring'em back PDQ.
LOL Roy. I wish I had thought of that years ago!
